tool_description: Splits time series data into training, validation, and test sets using time-aware methods that prevent look-ahead bias in backtesting scenarios.

input_data.description: Path to processed dataset ready for splitting

train_ratio.description: Proportion of data for training (0.1 to 0.9)

validation_ratio.description: Proportion of data for validation (0.0 to 0.4)

test_ratio.description: Proportion of data for testing (0.1 to 0.4)

error_messages: Invalid input data: Cannot access dataset or timestamp column missing
Invalid split ratios: train_ratio + validation_ratio + test_ratio must equal 1.0
Unsupported split method: Use supported methods (time_series, walk_forward, expanding_window)
Invalid ratio values: All ratios must be between 0.0 and 1.0
Insufficient data: Dataset too small for meaningful splits with specified ratios
usage: Provide input data path and optionally configure split method and ratios. Ensures temporal ordering is preserved for backtesting validity.

train_samples.description: Number of samples in training set

validation_samples.description: Number of samples in validation set

test_samples.description: Number of samples in test set
